content.text:
# List of international presidential trips made by Ilie Bolojan

This is a list of international presidential trips made by Ilie Bolojan during his time as acting President of Romania (12 February 2025 – 26 May 2025)
List
2025
{| class="wikitable sortable"
! scope=col | Date
! scope=col | Country
! scope=col | City
! scope=col | Notes
|-
|27 February
|
|Chișinău
|
|-
|2 March
|
|Lancaster House, London
|2025 London Summit on Ukraine
|-
|27 March
|
|Élysée Palace, Paris
|Bolojan attended a meeting of the "Coalition of the willing" hosted by President Macron.
|-
|26 April
|
|Vatican City
|Bolojan attended at the funeral of Pope Francis.
|-
|16 May
|
|Tirana
|6th European Political Community Summit
|-
